Current Stock:

Adding to cart… The item has been added

Add to Wish List

Create New Wish List

Description

Blind Pig Records is proud to announce the Vinyl Masters Series, a new line of remastered, high-quality 180gram virgin vinyl LPs.

This is the record Jimmy Thackery's fans have been clamoring for, a compendium of his hottest guitar instrumental tracks from the Blind Pig vaults. Included are three previously unreleased tunes, one a scorcher that features Duke Robillard.

"A dazzling disc displaying Thackery's sizzling six-string prowess" - AllMusic

"For Those who like their blues playing fast, distorted, and mean, each of these fully rockin' instrumentals are a crash course in the art of crowd-pleasing blues licks...like a Gatling gun loaded with sonic ammo from the melodic arsenals of Charlie Parker, Jimi Hendrix, Buddy Guy, and Stevie Ray Vaughan." - Guitar Player

Features:

 Limited Edition

 180g Vinyl

Musicians:

Jimmy Thackery, guitar

Mark Stutso, drums

Wayne Burdett, bass (1, 5, 8, 9)

Michael Patrick, bass (6, 7)

Ken Faltinson, bass (2-4), keyboards (4)

Jimmy Carpenter, saxophone (2-4)

Duke Robillard, guitar (3)

Selections:

1. Hang Up & Drive

2. Sinner Street

3. Jump For Jerry

4. Blues 'Fore Dawn

5. Rude Mood

6. Apache

7. All About My Girl

8. Last Night

9. Burford's Bop

10. The Stumble
